descrption: The 2023-2024 team was the first team of UMRT, founded by Syed Abraham Ahmed and Minjeong Kang. In their inaugural year, the team successfully built a fully functional rover to compete in the 2024 Canadian International Rover Challenge (CIRC). Their journey marked a significant milestone in the development of the team, setting a strong foundation for future growth.

roles.Communications Leads: Kevin Burston, Adam Garofalo, Minjeong Kang
